com.nequissimus.university.k1584.logic

Class PetriMarking

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nequissimus.university.k1584.logic.PetriMarking

  • public final class PetriMarking
extends java.lang.Object
    A marking that saves the number of tokens set for places.
    Only tokens > 0 will be saved, places missing from the map of saved tokens are assumed 0.

      • setTokens

        public void setTokens(PetriPlace place,

        Set the given number of tokens for a place.

        Parameters:
